org.jsimpledb.kv

Class KVImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsimpledb.kv.KVImplementation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArrayKVImplementation, BerkeleyKVImplementation, FoundationKVImplementation, LevelDBKVImplementation, MemoryKVImplementation, RaftKVImplementation, RocksDBKVImplementation, SQLDriverKVImplementation, SQLiteKVImplementation, XMLKVImplementation

    public abstract class KVImplementation
extends Object
    Descriptor for a KVDatabase implementation.

    Instances of this class provide information about how to configure and instantiate some technology-specific implementation of the KVDatabase and AtomicKVStore interfaces.

    • Field Detail

      • XML_DESCRIPTOR_RESOURCE

        public static final String XML_DESCRIPTOR_RESOURCE
        Classpath XML file resource describing available KVDatabase implementations: "META-INF/jsimpledb/kv-implementations.xml".

        Example: 

          <kv-implementations>
      <kv-implementation class="com.example.MyKVImplementation"/>
  </kv-implementations>

        Instances must have a public default constructor.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • log

        protected final Logger log

      • KVImplementation

        public KVImplementation()

    • Method Detail

      • getCommandLineOptions

        public abstract String[][] getCommandLineOptions()
        Get the command line options supported by this implementation, suitable for display in a usage help message.

        There must be at least one option, to indicate that this implementation is to be used.

        Returns:
        array of pairs: { option, description }

      • getUsageText

        public String getUsageText()
        Get additional usage message text, if any.

        The implementation in KVImplementation returns null.

        Returns:
        usage text if any, otherwise null

      • parseCommandLineOptions

        public abstract Object parseCommandLineOptions(ArrayDeque<String> options)
        Parse the specified command line options and return the resulting configuration, if possible.

        At least one option must be recognized, indicating that this implementation is to be used, otherwise null should be returned.

        Parameters:
        options - all command line options; upon return, recognized options should be removed
        Returns:
        configuration object representing the parsed options, or null if this implementation is not specified/configured
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an option is recognized but invalid

      • parseCommandLineOption

        protected String parseCommandLineOption(ArrayDeque<String> options,
                                        String flag)
        Subclass support method for parsing out a single command line flag and argument. If found, the flag and argument are removed from options.
        Parameters:
        options - command line options
        flag - command line flag taking an argument
        Returns:
        flag's argument, or null if flag is not present

      • parseCommandLineFlag

        protected boolean parseCommandLineFlag(ArrayDeque<String> options,
                                       String flag)
        Subclass support method for parsing out a boolean command line flag (i.e., a flag without an argument). If found, all instances of flag are removed from options.
        Parameters:
        options - command line options
        flag - command line flag taking an argument
        Returns:
        whether flag is present

      • createKVDatabase

        public abstract KVDatabase createKVDatabase(Object configuration,
                                            KVDatabase kvdb,
                                            AtomicKVStore kvstore)
        Create an KVDatabase using the specified configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        kvdb - required KVDatabase; will be null unless requiresKVDatabase(java.lang.Object) returned true
        kvstore - required AtomicKVStore; will be null unless requiresAtomicKVStore(java.lang.Object) returned true
        Returns:
        new KVDatabase instance

      • createAtomicKVStore

        public AtomicKVStore createAtomicKVStore(Object configuration)
        Create an AtomicKVStore using the specified configuration.

        The implementation in KVImplementation invokes createKVDatabase() and constructs a AtomicKVDatabase from the result. Implementations that natively support the AtomicKVDatabase interface should override this method.

        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        new AtomicKVStore instance

      • requiresAtomicKVStore

        public boolean requiresAtomicKVStore(Object configuration)
        Determine whether this KVDatabase implementation requires an underlying AtomicKVStore. If so, both implementations must be configured.

        The implementation in KVImplementation return false.

        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        true if the implementation relies on an underlying AtomicKVStore

      • requiresKVDatabase

        public boolean requiresKVDatabase(Object configuration)
        Determine whether this KVDatabase implementation requires some other underlying KVDatabase. If so, both implementations must be configured.

        The implementation in KVImplementation return false.

        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        true if the implementation relies on an underlying KVDatabase

      • getDescription

        public abstract String getDescription(Object configuration)
        Generate a short, human-readable description of the KVDatabase instance configured as given.
        Parameters:
        configuration - implementation configuration returned by parseCommandLineOptions()
        Returns:
        human-readable description

      • getImplementations

        public static KVImplementation[] getImplementations()
        Find available KVImplementations by scanning the classpath.

        This method searches the classpath for KVImplementation descriptor files and instantiates the corresponding KVImplementations. Example: 

          <kv-implementations>
      <kv-implementation class="com.example.MyKVImplementation"/>
  </kv-implementations>
        Returns:
        KVImplementations found on the classpath
